secret_passphrase.label: Secret passphrase
secret_passphrase.comment: The same as for HiPay Enterprise production account

secret_passphrase_test.label: Secret passphrase
secret_passphrase_test.comment: The same as for HiPay Enterprise test account

currency_transaction.label: Use order currency for transaction
currency_transaction.comment: Only if payment method is in "Sale" mode.

fingerprint_js_url.label: Url of Hipay's javascript for device fingerprint
fingerprint_js_url.comment: Not to be modified. Please read our documentation : https://developer.hipay.com/getting-started/platform-hipay-enterprise/overview/#device-fingerprint-integration

send_notification_url.label: Send Notification url
send_notification_url.comment: If enabled, then the URL of your site is sent during the payment and notifications will be sent to this URL. To use only for multi site.

secret_passphrase.label: Secret passphrase
secret_passphrase.comment: The same as for HiPay Enterprise production account

secret_passphrase_test.label: Secret passphrase
secret_passphrase_test.comment: The same as for HiPay Enterprise test account

moto_send_email.label: Send an email to customer to pay

init_hashing.comment: Retrieve the hashing configuration for notifications configured in your account.

activate_basket.label: Send cart items
activate_basket.comment: If yes, the customer's cart items are sent to HiPay

attribute_ean.label: Attribute ean
attribute_ean.comment: If your store supports ean, indicate the field name

load_product_ean.label: Load attribute
load_product_ean.comment: If you activate this option, a product loading is carried out to get ean (please see documentation)

informations_shipping.tooltip:
This mapping is necessary to indicate a match between your delivery methods and the delivery methods defined at HiPay.

For each customer order, depending on the chosen configuration, this information is sent as a supplement to the customer's basket.

For each mapping you have to fill out the following information:

  • "Preparation delay": Estimated day time for order preparation
  • "Delivery delay" : Estimated day time for delivery

From this information, an estimated (estimated) delivery day is calculated and sent with the transaction.

This information is required for Oney payment methods (Facily pay 3X, Facily pay 4X)

fraud_payment.label: Fraud Payment Review Email
fraud_payment.comment: This email is sended to customer, if his payment is in fraud state

copy_to.label: Send Payment Fraud Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Fraud Email Copy Method

fraud_payment_accept.label: Fraud Payment Accept Email
fraud_payment_accept.comment: This email is sended to customer, if his payment is validated by merchant

copy_to.label: Send Payment Accept Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Accept Email Copy Method

fraud_payment_deny.label: Fraud Payment Deny Email
fraud_payment_deny.comment: This email is sended to customer, if his payment is denied by merchant

copy_to.label: Send Payment Deny Email Copy To

copy_method.label: Send Payment Deny Email Copy Method

active.label: Enabled
active.comment: In order to activate this Payment Method, you have to add a valid 'Api TokenJS Password/Public Key' on the HiPay Entreprise configuration

order_status_payment_canceled.label: Order status when payment canceled by customer

success_redirect_page.label: Redirect page success
success_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction is successful, leave empty for checkout/onepage/success

failure_redirect_page.label: Redirect page failure
failure_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction fails, leave empty for checkout/onepage/failure

pending_redirect_page.label: Redirect page pending status
pending_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction is in pending status

payment_action.label: Capture
payment_action.comment: Not applicable for Bancontact / Mister Cash, transaction with this payment method will be automatically captured
payment_action.tooltip:
Manual: All transactions will be captured manually either from the Hipay Back office or from your Magento administration dashboard.
Automatic: All transactions will be captured automatically.

success_redirect_page.comment: Page to redirect when transaction is successful, leave empty for checkout/onepage/success

payment_action.label: Capture
payment_action.tooltip:
Manual: All transactions will be captured manually either from the Hipay Back office or from your Magento administration dashboard.
Automatic: All transactions will be captured automatically.

Manual: All transactions will be captured manually either from the Hipay Back office or from your Magento administration dashboard.
Automatic: All transactions will be captured automatically.
